reviewText: This was sent from Germany and not compatible with american machines.
Great movie and specially and as always the acting of Stana Katic. Love it. Thank you Stana.
My mistake. It said as plain as day it would not play on territory 1. So you get a good review because it is not your fault I didn't read it. You are honorable;I am stupid. Frank Diegmann
Was not in english very disappointed. Do you have this item in english?
Great addition to my Stana Katic collection
I had to find the English version for this movie, but once that was done. I enjoyed to movie

Seen this movie on television and enjoyed  it very much. Tried to purchase the English DVD but could not find it. When I saw the Blu--ray available I purchased it but did not realize it was the German version. I later found that it had the English version on the same Blu-ray and so I kept it and was happy I did because I really like the show. I only purchase the ones that I know I will watch again and again. If you like the Asian dragon shows you will like this one for the evil and magic is overcome with goodness and magic
The movie was very good. I never saw this movie before; and I think everybody should watch it. They would like it. I hope there will be more movies like this.
